00030 #undef ERROR    /* Defined by windows */
00031 
00032 #if defined(__cplusplus)
00033 #if !defined(NO_WINPATCHER_NAMESPACE)
00034 namespace winpatcher {
00035 #else
00036 extern "C" {
00037 #endif
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 typedef enum StatusCode_t
00041 {
00042         ERROR=-1,
00043         SUCCESS=0
00044 } StatusCode;
00045 typedef struct Status_t
00046 {
00047         StatusCode code;                                /* <0 = error, >=0 success */
00048         const char *sourcefile;
00049         int sourcelineno;
00050         TCHAR msg[65];
00051 } Status;
00052 #define MKSTATUS(ret, codev) ( ret.code=codev, ret.sourcefile=__FILE__, ret.sourcelineno=__LINE__, ret )
00053 #define MKSTATUSWIN(ret) MakeStatusFromWindowsError(&ret, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00054 
00055 static Status MakeStatusFromWindowsError(Status *ret, const char *file, int lineno)
00056 {
00057         ret->code=-(int)GetLastError();
00058         ret->sourcefile=file;
00059         ret->sourcelineno=lineno;
00060         FormatMessage(FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM|FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS, NULL, -ret->code, 0, ret->msg, (sizeof(ret->msg)/sizeof(TCHAR))-1, NULL);
00061         ret->msg[64]=0;
00062         return *ret;
00063 }
00064 
00065 static void MakeReportFromStatus(TCHAR *buffer, size_t bufflen, const Status *ret)
00066 {
00067         TCHAR *p;
00068         const char *s;
00069         if(ret->code>=0)
00070                 _stprintf_s(buffer, bufflen, __T("Success code %d at "), ret->code);
00071         else
00072                 _stprintf_s(buffer, bufflen, __T("Error code %d (%s) at "), ret->code, ret->msg);
00073         for(p=_tcschr(buffer, 0), s=ret->sourcefile; *s; p++, s++)
00074                 *p=*s;
00075         _stprintf_s(p, bufflen-(p-buffer)/sizeof(TCHAR), __T(":%d\n"), ret->sourcelineno);
00076 }
00077 
00078 #if defined(__cplusplus)
00079 }
00080 #endif
